forecast-period.text: Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower during the morning and afternoon. Light winds becoming south to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then tending south to southeasterly in the early afternoon. Daytime maximum temperatures around 20.
Low-Moderate

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers west of Nullarbor, slight (30%) chance of showers remainder west of Ceduna, most likely from the late morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between 12 and 16 with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 20s.

Overnight temperatures falling to between 14 and 18 with daytime temperatures reaching 26 to 32.
